languages.text: "Мы все знаем, о каком зле речь", {n}— Ирлиэт, наконец, приходит в себя.{/n} "Слепец! Он не видит, что уже впустил тьму, что она здесь повсюду..."

traits.locale_text: "Мы все знаем, о каком зле речь", {n}— Ирлиэт, наконец, приходит в себя.{/n} "Слепец! Он не видит, что уже впустил тьму, что она здесь повсюду..."

languages.text: "We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."
languages.original_text: "Мы все знаем, о каком зле речь", {n}— Ирлиэт, наконец, приходит в себя.{/n} "Слепец! Он не видит, что уже впустил тьму, что она здесь повсюду..."

traits.locale_text: "We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."
"We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."
"We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."
"We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."

languages.text: «Todos sabemos a qué mal nos referimos», {n}dice Yrliet tras recuperar los ánimos.{/n} «¡Está ciego! No ve que ya ha dejado entrar a la oscuridad y ya nos rodea...».
languages.original_text: "We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."

traits.locale_text: «Todos sabemos a qué mal nos referimos», {n}dice Yrliet tras recuperar los ánimos.{/n} «¡Está ciego! No ve que ya ha dejado entrar a la oscuridad y ya nos rodea...».

languages.text: “我们都知道我们指的是哪种邪恶之物。”{n}伊莉耶特终于平静了下来，说出了这句话。{/n}“他已经瞎了！他没有看到他放任黑暗之物上了船。它就在这里，就在我们身边……”
languages.original_text: "We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."

traits.locale_text: “我们都知道我们指的是哪种邪恶之物。”{n}伊莉耶特终于平静了下来，说出了这句话。{/n}“他已经瞎了！他没有看到他放任黑暗之物上了船。它就在这里，就在我们身边……”

languages.text: 「みんな誰が悪かわかっている」{n}ユリエットは冷静さを取り戻すとやっと口を開いた。{/n}「アイツは何も見えていない！招き入れてしまった闇に、みんなが飲み込まれていると気づいていないんだ…」
languages.original_text: "We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."

traits.locale_text: 「みんな誰が悪かわかっている」{n}ユリエットは冷静さを取り戻すとやっと口を開いた。{/n}「アイツは何も見えていない！招き入れてしまった闇に、みんなが飲み込まれていると気づいていないんだ…」

languages.text: "Wir wissen alle von welchem Übel wir sprechen," {n}verkündet Yrliet schließlich und entspannt sich.{/n} "Er ist blind! Er sieht nicht, dass er die Dunkelheit schon eingelassen hat, dass sie hier ist und uns alle umgibt ..."
languages.original_text: "We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wissen alle von welchem Übel wir sprechen," {n}verkündet Yrliet schließlich und entspannt sich.{/n} "Er ist blind! Er sieht nicht, dass er die Dunkelheit schon eingelassen hat, dass sie hier ist und uns alle umgibt ..."

languages.text: « Nous savons tous de quel mal il parle, {n}déclare Yrliet, qui se ressaisit enfin.{/n} Il est aveugle ! Il ne voit pas qu'il a déjà laissé entrer les ténèbres, qu'elles sont là, tout autour de nous... »
languages.original_text: "We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."

traits.locale_text: « Nous savons tous de quel mal il parle, {n}déclare Yrliet, qui se ressaisit enfin.{/n} Il est aveugle ! Il ne voit pas qu'il a déjà laissé entrer les ténèbres, qu'elles sont là, tout autour de nous... »

languages.text: "Hangi şerden bahsettiğimiz belli." {n} diyor toparlanan ve nihayet konuşmaya başlayan Yrliet.{/n} "Kör işte! Etrafımızdaki saran karanlığı yanımıza davet ettiğini görmüyor..."
languages.original_text: "We all know which evil we mean," {n}says Yrliet finally, recovering herself.{/n} "He is blind! He does not see that he has already let the darkness in, that it is here, all around us..."

traits.locale_text: “Hangi şerden bahsettiğimiz belli.” {n}Toparlanan Yrliet, nihayet konuşuyor.{/n} “Kör işte! Etrafımızdaki bu karanlığın girmesine müsaade ettiğini görmüyor...”
